title: Show full background image with no cropping (use background-size: contain)

requirements.text: Update the global responsive background CSS so the body background image is never cropped by switching from `background-size: cover` to `background-size: contain` (mobile and desktop), while keeping the existing background image asset references and `background-repeat: no-repeat`.

quotes: yes do that. I want no cut off at all.

acceptanceCriteria: On mobile (<768px), the full background image is visible without any cropping.
On desktop (>=768px), the full background image is visible without any cropping.
The existing background image sources referenced via `--bg-image-mobile` and `--bg-image-desktop` remain unchanged.
The background does not tile (no-repeat remains in effect).

requirements.text: Adjust global `background-position` values for the body background (mobile default and the `@media (min-width: 768px)` rule) as needed so the full image remains fully visible and not shifted off-screen after switching to `background-size: contain`.

quotes: I want no cut off at all.

acceptanceCriteria: After the change to `background-size: contain`, the background-position settings do not result in any part of the background image being clipped outside the viewport.
The background remains visually centered/appropriate on both mobile and desktop breakpoints.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui/*.
Keep the existing background asset references in frontend/src/index.css unchanged (the `--bg-image-mobile` and `--bg-image-desktop` image-set URLs).
nonGoals: Do not add or modify backend functionality.
Do not generate or edit any image assets.
Do not change any other layout/styling unrelated to making the background fully visible (no cropping).
